name: smoothfm
0:
”Alexa, open smooth f. m.”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smooth f. m.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can now play your favourite smoothfm stations on your Alexa-enabled devices.

It’s as easy as saying “Alexa, play smoothfm”.

Alexa can play live radio from all of smoothfm’s stations and you can even ask what song is playing! Learn more about the ways you can listen to smoothfm here - https://www.smooth.com.au/how-to-listen-to-smoothfm-anywhere

You can also listen to featured podcasts by saying “Alexa, ask smoothfm to play a podcast”.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
